description: Triggered when the user sends a message via the composer.

isEditing.description: Whether the user's composer interaction was editing a previously sent event.

isReply.description: Whether the user's composer interaction was a reply to a previously sent event.

inThread.description: Whether the user was using the composer inside of a thread.

startsThread.description: Whether this message begins a new thread or not.

editor.description: Whether this message was composed in legacy editor, the new the rich text editor or the new plain text editor

isMarkdownEnabled.description: Whether markdown is supported in the editor. This value is not applicable (always false) if editor is RteFormatting.
